original_text: But the servants of David had smitten of Benjamin, and of Abner's men, so that three hundred and threescore men died.
korean_text: 다윗의 신복들이 베냐민과 아브넬에게 속한 자들을 쳐서 삼백육십 명을 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: But the servants of David had smitten
of Benjamin, and of Abner's men
so that three hundred and threescore men died
